layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x275
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x275
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x251
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 149x19
          text run at (0,0) width 149: "TH VALIGN=MIDDLE"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,36) size 636x215 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 634x213
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 634x209
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (2,2) size 204x209 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutImage {img} at (2,2) size 200x200
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (208,94) size 424x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]

                text run at (2,2) width 290: "This text should be vertically aligned to the "
                text run at (292,2) width 130: "middle of the image"
